LanguageData.Plant_PosFlower.label: Helianto
LanguageData.Plant_PosFlower.description: Genetically engineered plants. It mainly serves as a signal to collect substances that enhance Miho's mind.
LanguageData.RawPosFlower.label: Helianto Petal
LanguageData.RawPosFlower.description: The petals are agglomerated substances that help Miho's minds to be expressed.
LanguageData.RawPosFlower_Dust.label: Solar Powder
LanguageData.RawPosFlower_Dust.description: A powder of tiny mechanite crystals extracted from meat. Easy to store.
